description: A Python templating library in the style of Jinja2 and Django templates featuring the full power of Python in the expressions that can be embedded in the template files. Hailstorm was extracted from the templating code that is part of Tornado Web Server framework published by Facebook.
longdescription: A Python templating library in the style of Jinja2 and Django templates featuring the full power of Python in the expressions that can be embedded in the template files. Hailstorm was extracted from the templating code that is part of Tornado Web Server framework published by Facebook.
